title: Snow White and Rose Red
description: Snow White and Rose Red is a retelling of the Brothers Grimm fairy tale in which two kind sisters find themselves taking in a wild bear. Will the bear return the favor and help the kindhearted sisters when they find themselves in danger? The book can be used to teach students how to analyze characters within the text and to understand adverbs.
highFrequencyWords: acquaintance, admonished, amiable, condemned, departure, entangled, hearth, morsels, obliged, shears, spare, treasures
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
phonics:
